20using QtNodes::FlowScene;
21using QtNodes::FlowView;
22FlowView::FlowView(QWidget *parent)
23 : QGraphicsView(parent), _clearSelectionAction(Q_NULLPTR), _deleteSelectionAction(Q_NULLPTR), _scene(Q_NULLPTR)
24{
25 setDragMode(QGraphicsView::ScrollHandDrag);
26 setRenderHint(QPainter::Antialiasing);
27 auto const &flowViewStyle = StyleCollection::flowViewStyle();
28 setBackgroundBrush(flowViewStyle.BackgroundColor);
29 // setViewportUpdateMode(QGraphicsView::FullViewportUpdate);
30 // setViewportUpdateMode(QGraphicsView::MinimalViewportUpdate);
31 setHorizontalScrollBarPolicy(Qt::ScrollBarAlwaysOff);
32 setVerticalScrollBarPolicy(Qt::ScrollBarAlwaysOff);
33 setTransformationAnchor(QGraphicsView::AnchorUnderMouse);
34 setCacheMode(QGraphicsView::CacheBackground);
35 // setViewport(new QGLWidget(QGLFormat(QGL::SampleBuffers)));
36}
37FlowView::FlowView(FlowScene *scene, QWidget *parent) : FlowView(parent)
38{
39 setScene(scene);
40}
41QAction *FlowView::clearSelectionAction() const
42{
43 return _clearSelectionAction;
44}
45QAction *FlowView::deleteSelectionAction() const
46{
47 return _deleteSelectionAction;
48}
49void FlowView::setScene(FlowScene *scene)
50{
51 _scene = scene;
52 QGraphicsView::setScene(_scene);
53 // setup actions
54 delete _clearSelectionAction;
55 _clearSelectionAction = new QAction(QStringLiteral("Clear Selection"), this);
56 _clearSelectionAction->setShortcut(Qt::Key_Escape);
57 connect(_clearSelectionAction, &QAction::triggered, _scene, &QGraphicsScene::clearSelection);
58 addAction(_clearSelectionAction);
59 delete _deleteSelectionAction;
60 _deleteSelectionAction = new QAction(QStringLiteral("Delete Selection"), this);
61 _deleteSelectionAction->setShortcut(Qt::Key_Delete);
62 connect(_deleteSelectionAction, &QAction::triggered, this, &FlowView::deleteSelectedNodes);
63 addAction(_deleteSelectionAction);
64}
65void FlowView::contextMenuEvent(QContextMenuEvent *event)
66{
67 if (itemAt(event->pos()))
68 {
69 QGraphicsView::contextMenuEvent(event);
70 return;
71 }
72 QMenu modelMenu;
73 auto skipText = QStringLiteral("skip me");
74 // Add filterbox to the context menu
75 auto *txtBox = new QLineEdit(&modelMenu);
76 txtBox->setPlaceholderText(QStringLiteral("Filter"));
77 txtBox->setClearButtonEnabled(true);
78 auto *txtBoxAction = new QWidgetAction(&modelMenu);
79 txtBoxAction->setDefaultWidget(txtBox);
80 modelMenu.addAction(txtBoxAction);
81 // Add result treeview to the context menu
82 auto *treeView = new QTreeWidget(&modelMenu);
83 treeView->header()->close();
84 auto *treeViewAction = new QWidgetAction(&modelMenu);
85 treeViewAction->setDefaultWidget(treeView);
86 modelMenu.addAction(treeViewAction);
87 QMap<QString, QTreeWidgetItem *> topLevelItems;
88 for (auto const &cat : _scene->registry().categories())
89 {
90 auto item = new QTreeWidgetItem(treeView);
91 item->setText(0, cat);
92 item->setData(0, Qt::UserRole, skipText);
93 topLevelItems[cat] = item;
94 }
95 for (auto const &assoc : _scene->registry().registeredModelsCategoryAssociation())
96 {
97 auto parent = topLevelItems[assoc.second];
98 auto item = new QTreeWidgetItem(parent);
99 item->setText(0, assoc.first);
100 item->setData(0, Qt::UserRole, assoc.first);
101 }
102 treeView->expandAll();
103 connect(treeView, &QTreeWidget::itemClicked, [&](QTreeWidgetItem *item, int) {
104 QString modelName = item->data(0, Qt::UserRole).toString();
105 if (modelName == skipText)
106 {
107 return;
108 }
109 auto type = _scene->registry().create(modelName);
110 if (type)
111 {
112 auto &node = _scene->createNode(std::move(type));
113 QPoint pos = event->pos();
114 QPointF posView = this->mapToScene(pos);
115 node.nodeGraphicsObject().setPos(posView);
116 _scene->nodePlaced(node);
117 }
118 else
119 {
120 qDebug() << "Model not found";
121 }
122 modelMenu.close();
123 });
124 // Setup filtering
125 connect(txtBox, &QLineEdit::textChanged, [&](const QString &text) {
126 for (auto &topLvlItem : topLevelItems)
127 {
128 for (int i = 0; i < topLvlItem->childCount(); ++i)
129 {
130 auto child = topLvlItem->child(i);
131 auto modelName = child->data(0, Qt::UserRole).toString();
132 const bool match = (modelName.contains(text, Qt::CaseInsensitive));
133 child->setHidden(!match);
134 }
135 }
136 });
137 // make sure the text box gets focus so the user doesn't have to click on it
138 txtBox->setFocus();
139 modelMenu.exec(event->globalPos());
140}
141void FlowView::wheelEvent(QWheelEvent *event)
142{
143 QPoint delta = event->angleDelta();
144 if (delta.y() == 0)
145 {
146 event->ignore();
147 return;
148 }
149 double const d = delta.y() / std::abs(delta.y());
150 if (d > 0.0)
151 scaleUp();
152 else
153 scaleDown();
154}
155void FlowView::scaleUp()
156{
157 double const step = 1.2;
158 double const factor = std::pow(step, 1.0);
159 QTransform t = transform();
160 if (t.m11() > 2.0)
161 return;
162 scale(factor, factor);
163}
164void FlowView::scaleDown()
165{
166 double const step = 1.2;
167 double const factor = std::pow(step, -1.0);
168 scale(factor, factor);
169}
170void FlowView::deleteSelectedNodes()
171{
172 // Delete the selected connections first, ensuring that they won't be
173 // automatically deleted when selected nodes are deleted (deleting a node
174 // deletes some connections as well)
175 for (QGraphicsItem *item : _scene->selectedItems())
176 {
177 if (auto c = qgraphicsitem_cast<ConnectionGraphicsObject *>(item))
178 _scene->deleteConnection(c->connection());
179 }
180 // Delete the nodes; this will delete many of the connections.
181 // Selected connections were already deleted prior to this loop, otherwise
182 // qgraphicsitem_cast<NodeGraphicsObject*>(item) could be a use-after-free
183 // when a selected connection is deleted by deleting the node.
184 for (QGraphicsItem *item : _scene->selectedItems())
185 {
186 if (auto n = qgraphicsitem_cast<NodeGraphicsObject *>(item))
187 _scene->removeNode(n->node());
188 }
189}
190void FlowView::keyPressEvent(QKeyEvent *event)
191{
192 switch (event->key())
193 {
194 case Qt::Key_Shift: setDragMode(QGraphicsView::RubberBandDrag); break;
195 default: break;
196 }
197 QGraphicsView::keyPressEvent(event);
198}
199void FlowView::keyReleaseEvent(QKeyEvent *event)
200{
201 switch (event->key())
202 {
203 case Qt::Key_Shift: setDragMode(QGraphicsView::ScrollHandDrag); break;
204 default: break;
205 }
206 QGraphicsView::keyReleaseEvent(event);
207}
208void FlowView::mousePressEvent(QMouseEvent *event)
209{
210 QGraphicsView::mousePressEvent(event);
211 if (event->button() == Qt::LeftButton)
212 {
213 _clickPos = mapToScene(event->pos());
214 }
215}
216void FlowView::mouseMoveEvent(QMouseEvent *event)
217{
218 QGraphicsView::mouseMoveEvent(event);
219 if (scene()->mouseGrabberItem() == nullptr && event->buttons() == Qt::LeftButton)
220 {
221 // Make sure shift is not being pressed
222 if ((event->modifiers() & Qt::ShiftModifier) == 0)
223 {
224 QPointF difference = _clickPos - mapToScene(event->pos());
225 setSceneRect(sceneRect().translated(difference.x(), difference.y()));
226 }
227 }
228}
229void FlowView::drawBackground(QPainter *painter, const QRectF &r)
230{
231 QGraphicsView::drawBackground(painter, r);
232 auto drawGrid = [&](double gridStep) {
233 QRect windowRect = rect();
234 QPointF tl = mapToScene(windowRect.topLeft());
235 QPointF br = mapToScene(windowRect.bottomRight());
236 double left = std::floor(tl.x() / gridStep - 0.5);
237 double right = std::floor(br.x() / gridStep + 1.0);
238 double bottom = std::floor(tl.y() / gridStep - 0.5);
239 double top = std::floor(br.y() / gridStep + 1.0);
240 // vertical lines
241 for (int xi = int(left); xi <= int(right); ++xi)
242 {
243 QLineF line(xi * gridStep, bottom * gridStep, xi * gridStep, top * gridStep);
244 painter->drawLine(line);
245 }
246 // horizontal lines
247 for (int yi = int(bottom); yi <= int(top); ++yi)
248 {
249 QLineF line(left * gridStep, yi * gridStep, right * gridStep, yi * gridStep);
250 painter->drawLine(line);
251 }
252 };
253 auto const &flowViewStyle = StyleCollection::flowViewStyle();
254 QBrush bBrush = backgroundBrush();
255 QPen pfine(flowViewStyle.FineGridColor, 1.0);
256 painter->setPen(pfine);
257 drawGrid(15);
258 QPen p(flowViewStyle.CoarseGridColor, 1.0);
259 painter->setPen(p);
260 drawGrid(150);
261}
262void FlowView::showEvent(QShowEvent *event)
263{
264 _scene->setSceneRect(this->rect());
265 QGraphicsView::showEvent(event);
266}
267FlowScene *FlowView::scene()
268{
269 return _scene;
270}
